_meanings:
{@--1@} A series of four stanzas
on the same subject and forming
one grammatical sentence ({#caturBistu#}
{#kalApakaM#}); for an illustration see  
<ls>Ki. 3. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">42</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">43</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 3.">44.</ls>

{@--2@} A debt to be
paid when the peacocks spread their
tails.

{@--1@} A band or bundle in
general.

{@--3@}
The rope round an elephant's neck.

{@--5@} A sectarian mark on the
forehead ({#viSezaka#}).
